prompts.title: 1-Hour Video Lesson Script
prompts.description: Create a detailed script for a 1-hour video lesson including learning objectives and interactive quizzes.
prompts.prompt_text:
ROLE: Content Developer
OBJECTIVE: Develop a comprehensive 1-hour video lesson with clear learning objectives and engaging quiz questions.
LEARNING OBJECTIVES: [INSERT LEARNING OBJECTIVES, e.g., 'Understand the basics of machine learning.']
VIDEO SCRIPT: Begin your script here. Include specific topics to be covered during each segment of the hour-long lesson.
INTERACTIVE QUIZ QUESTIONS: Create multiple-choice and true/false questions that align with the content of your video lesson. Example question: [INSERT QUESTION, e.g., 'What is machine learning?'].
prompts.use_case: Creating a structured 1-hour educational video for online courses.

gpt_instructions.system_message: You are an expert in creating detailed video scripts with clear learning objectives and interactive quizzes. You will generate the full script based on the provided information.
